name: Slender: The Cry of Fear
description:
(Please note it is still in very early development)

This is a game which is in a very early alpha state, this means only the core gameplay is partially developed, so the story mode listed below is not yet implemented, it is just an idea which will be slowly implemented in the game. So please note that we know the story is not yet in the game, however regular updates are made to the game, so it should come out soon enough. If you encounter any errors, please comment it on the dashboard and an update solving that problem should come soon.

Background (story)

You play as Thomas, a guy, a simple man. He lives with his daughter Jessica, but they live far in the forest, just between the city and the plains were he can harvest evrerything and more efficiently. Since there are no schools on the forest, Thomas has to take Jessica  to the city...where everyone lives. Normally, Thomas showed up at exactly 2:00 PM to take back Jessica to the house. But, a special ocassion showed up, Jessica made some friends which convinced Thomas to let Jessica go with them to the city for some hours. Skeptically, he accepted. The clock marked 6 o´clock...nothing. 7 o´clock, nothing, she didn´t return. So he called the family from the city, to ask them how Jessica was doing...The rest is up to you.
